attributes.additional_details:
Any further referendum would damage the image of British Democracy and the values this country stands for.

Members of this petition do not necessary agree with the conduct of the campaigns and how they were run.
attributes.background: We the undersigned who were members of both the Remain and Leave sides call upon HM Government to uphold the democracy delivered. The public has spoken and while we may not all agree with the result we agree that the vote was fair and delivered legally and must now be acted upon it.
